question: Who of the following urges medical researches to explore ancient methods to cure Cancer?
explanation: Vice president Venkaiah Naidu urges medical researches to explore ancient methods to cure Cancer. Ancient Indian medical systems have to be used by the doctors in order to cure diseases. Going back to the roots and using Ayurveda for treatment of the patients will enable them to recover easily and early. The people suffering from sickness should be given an early screening so as to let them know about the sickness and the necessary treatment they will go through in this process.
